channel.title: Can someone help me with accurate mage xp
channel.description: I'm using the figment scape source mainly because its a good source. I'm trying to make the xp as it is in runescape for mage spells and i cant it seems to times what ever u hit by 1000 can anyone help me with this...ive change how much it gives u for and xp rate but..still adds 1k xp per number hit. :confused:
